item.description:
A Medical Device Company Showcase
When: Wednesday, November 17, from 5:00 p.m. to 8:00 p.m.
Where: UMASS Lowell Inn & Conference Center
50 Warren St.
Lowell, MA 01852
Regiser: www.mvvf.org
Back by popular demand! MVVF and M2D2 hosted a very successful medical device showcase last year and are pleased to bring you another with different companies. The program features emerging enterprises presenting their new medical device technologies. Each company will also have a poster presentation which will be available for viewing during the networking hour.
item.name: A Medical Device Company Showcase
